item.title: Project Milestone 1: Getting started
item.description: Overview A vast majority of databases in use these days are relational, and popular implementations like Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL and PostgreSQL dominate the database software market. A critical component of a database system is its index, a structure that allows efficient retrieval and join operations on the underlying tables. Over the quarter we shall be using Redbase, an instructional relational database written in C++ that is complete, but does not implement an index.
